sentences.sContent: ...a violent slap on the side of the head, which stunned and stupefied him.
sentences.sCn: ...他的一边脑袋上猛地挨了一巴掌，使他顿时觉得头晕目眩。

remMethod.val: stup(笨， 呆) ＋ efy → 吓呆 → 使惊讶

words.tran: 目瞪口呆的；呆若木鸡的
使人目瞪口呆的；让人昏沉的
昏迷的，不省人事的；无感觉的
使发呆；使失去知觉（stupefy的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: If something stupefies you, it shocks or surprises you so much that you cannot think properly for a while
